name: Price Missing
description: Product price is null or missing during order creation
suggested_fix: Check inventory service response; ensure price is set before order submission

name: Inventory Unavailable
description: Requested product is out of stock
suggested_fix: Notify customer; show alternative products or waitlist option

name: Payment Failure
suggested_fix: Verify payment gateway credentials; check card validity; retry with exponential backoff

name: Database Connection Error
suggested_fix: Check database availability; verify connection string; check firewall/network

name: External Service Timeout
suggested_fix: Check external service health; increase timeout if acceptable; implement fallback

name: Data Validation Error
suggested_fix: Review input validation rules; check client-side validation; log exact field failures

name: Duplicate Order Detected
description: Attempted to create a duplicate order
suggested_fix: Return existing order; implement idempotency keys in client

name: Authorization Failure
suggested_fix: Verify user roles and permissions; check access control policies

name: Unhandled Exception
suggested_fix: Review stack trace; check error logs for root cause; escalate to dev team
